title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with large Bowie knife on belt] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform with large Bowie knife on belt] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
